entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
